required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Placement of Peripheral Venous Catheters Under Echo Guidance in a Post-emergency Medical Service
clinical_study.official_title: Placement of Peripheral Venous Catheters Under Echo Guidance in a Post-emergency Medical Service

brief_summary.textblock: Compare the number of attempts to place a peripheral venous catheter in the group of patients hospitalized in the post-emergency unit and benefiting from echo guidance and therapeutic communication, to the group of patients hospitalized on the post-emergency unit using traditional technique.

primary_outcome.measure: successful placement of a venous catheter on the first attempt
primary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour after insertion of peripheral venous catheter
primary_outcome.description: percentage of successful placement of a venous catheter on the first attempt

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour after insertion of peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.description: not validated Satisfaction questionnaire and pain scale. score between 0 and 30 corresponding to high satisfaction

secondary_outcome.measure: number of attempts to insert a peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour during insertion of peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.description: Average in each group of the number of attempts

secondary_outcome.measure: number of calls for a second nurse in the service
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour during insertion of peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.description: Average in each group of the number of service's interveners for a catheter placement

secondary_outcome.measure: number of calls to a nurse anesthetist
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour during insertion of peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.description: Average in each group of the number of external interveners

secondary_outcome.measure: location of the final placement site
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour during insertion of peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients in each group according to the location of the final placement site

secondary_outcome.measure: the caliber of the catheter placed
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour during insertion of peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients in each group according to the caliber of the catheter placed
total number of infectious or thromboembolic events at the implantation site during the patient's stay in the post-emergency unit

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the hour during insertion of peripheral venous catheter
secondary_outcome.description: Average duration, in minutes, of catheter placement in each group
functional life of the catheter, by group.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study inclusion, at 6 month
secondary_outcome.description: not validated Satisfaction questionnaire for nursing staff in the post-emergency unit . score between 0 and 55 corresponding to a high satisfaction

arm_group.description: insertion of a peripheral venous catheter with ultrasound guidance and therapeutic communication
insertion of a peripheral venous catheter conventionally

intervention.description: insertion of a peripheral venous catheter with ultrasound guidance and therapeutic communication

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Hospitalized in the post-emergency unit
- Requiring the placement of a venous catheter in the post-emergency unit
- Affiliation to social security or benefiting from such a scheme
- Informed and written consent signed
Exclusion Criteria:
- Protected person (art. L1121-5 to L1121-8 of the CSP)
- Patient included in another interventional study
- Patient already included for a first catheter placement in the post-emergency unit.
